titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2493) to establish a mechanism by which the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior can provide for uniform management of livestock grazing on Federal lands.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-355, by Mr. McInnis.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2493 with 3 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2493 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. The bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule for a period not to exceed 3 hours. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Resources no printed in the bill. Before consideration of any other amendment, it shall be in order to consider the amendmtn printed in the report accompanying this resolution, debatable for 10 minutes.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 121.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 284.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on the resolution, the Speaker put the question and by voice vote, declared that the ayes had prevailed. Ms. Slaughter demanded the Yeas and Nays and after the Speaker ordered the roll call, further proceedings were postponed until October 30, 1997.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 277 - 139 (Roll no. 545).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/28/1997--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 2493 (livestock grazing on Federal lands).
